script:
;;-----------------------------------------
;;2月覚醒CCマイペ
# script "lisp"
# background "ancient_back"
# bgm "bgm036" 0
;;-----------------------------------------
;;方天画戟
# body 300331
# pos 300331 3
# scale 300331 0.8 0
# alpha 300331 0 0
# mask 300331 off
# body 300335
# pos 300335 5
# scale 300335 0.8 0
# alpha 300335 0 0
# mask 300335 off
;;ケラウノス
# body 500131
# pos 500131 3
# scale 500131 0.8 0
# alpha 500131 0 0
# mask 500131 off
# body 500134
# pos 500134 3
# scale 500134 0.8 0
# alpha 500134 0 0
# mask 500134 off
;;アバリス
# body 3401011
# pos 3401011 3
# scale 3401011 0.8 0
# alpha 3401011 0 0
# mask 3401011 off
;;パラケルスｓ
# body 3101311
# pos 3101311 3
# scale 3101311 0.8 0
# alpha 3101311 0 0
# mask 3101311 off
;;-----------------------------------------
# imageset 1 "bg_white_circle"
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagelayer 1 4
# imagescale 1 1.2 0
# imageset 2 "bg_white_circle"
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# imagelayer 2 5
# imagescale 2 1.4 0
# imageset 3 "bg_white"
# imagealpha 3 0 0
# imagelayer 3 6
# imagescale 3 1.2 0
# imageset 4 "black"
# imagealpha 4 0 0
# imagelayer 4 1
# imagescale 4 1.2 0
;;-----------------------------------------
# envbody 11111 8 0
# effectpattern 11111 1 0
;;-----------------------------------------
# textwindow "close"
# fadein "black" 0.5
# waitandnext 0.5

# textwindow "nomal"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 36
# textflame 0 0
@
[FF0000]覚醒ユニット追加！[-]

# se "SE_2520"
# fadein "white" 0.5
# alpha 300331 1 0
# textalign "center"
# textsize 36
@
方 天 画 戟

# se "SE_0539"
# textwindow "close"
# imagealpha 3 1 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 1

# alpha 300331 0 0
# alpha 300335 0.7 0
# imagealpha 1 1 0
# imagepos 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 1 0
# imagepos 2 0 0
# waitandnext 0.1

# imagealpha 3 0 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# move 300335 2 12
# waitandnext 0.3

# voice 3003 "hotengageki_kyara_0019"
# waitandnext 3

# imagealpha 3 1 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 1

# alpha 300335 1 0
# move 300335 3 0
# scale 300335 0.8 0
# envbody 1002 11 0
# effectpattern 1002 2 0
# effectstart 1002
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagealpha 3 0 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 0.4

# se "SE_0548"
# waitandnext 0.3

# textwindow "nomal"
# textsize 24
# voice 3003 "hotengageki_kyara_0014"
# textflame 1 1
# textboxarrow 0 2
@方天画戟
これぞ覇王の武！
天下に轟く我が力！

# se "SE_4779"
# textwindow "close"
# fadeout "black" 1
# waitandnext 1

# se "SE_2520"
# fadein "white" 0.5
# alpha 300335 0 0
# alpha 500131 1 0
# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
# textwindow "nomal"
# textsize 36
@
ケ ラ ウ ノ ス

# se "SE_0539"
# textwindow "close"
# imagealpha 3 1 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 1

# alpha 500131 0 0
# alpha 500134 0.7 0
# imagealpha 1 1 0
# imagepos 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 1 0
# imagepos 2 0 0
# waitandnext 0.1

# imagealpha 3 0 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# move 300335 2 12
# waitandnext 0.3

# voice 5001 "keraunosu_kyara_0019"
# waitandnext 3.5

# imagealpha 3 1 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 1

# alpha 500134 1 0
# move 500134 3 0
# scale 500134 0.8 0
# envbody 1002 11 0
# effectpattern 1002 2 0
# effectstart 1002
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagealpha 3 0 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 0.4

# se "SE_0548"
# waitandnext 0.3

# textwindow "nomal"
# textsize 24
# voice 5001 "keraunosu_kyara_0015"
# textflame 1 1
# textboxarrow 0 2
@ケラウノス
みんなの力…
この雷霆に込めるよ

# se "SE_0619"
# textwindow "close"
# fadeout "black" 1
# waitandnext 1

# effectskip 1002
# alpha 500134 0 0
# waitandnext 0.5

# fadein "black" 0.5
# waitandnext 0.5

# textwindow "nomal"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 32
# textflame 0 0
@
イベントクエスト
「淘汰の彼方に」開催！

;;暗転(大)
# bgm "stop"
# fadeout "black" 2
# se "SE_0050"
# textwindow "nomal"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 32
# waitandnext 2
@
イベントクエスト
「淘汰の彼方に」開催！

# textwindow "close"
# background "profound"
# bgmfile "bgm263" "BgmLostRagnarok001" 0
# imagealpha 1 1 0
# imagepos 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 1 0
# imagepos 2 0 0
# fadein "black" 1
# waitandnext 1.5

# fadein "white" 0.8
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagepos 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# imagepos 2 0 0
# effectstart 11111
# fadein "white" 0.5
# se "SE_1051"
# textwindow "nomal"
# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
# textsize 28
@
クラスチェンジユニット追加！

# alpha 3401011 1 0
# fadein "white" 0.7
# se "SE_9040"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 32
@
アバリス･D. plug･パズズ
「[32CD32]ブラストマスター[-]」
「[B22222]ヴェノムハザード[-]」

# alpha 3401011 0 0
# alpha 3101311 1 0
# fadein "white" 0.7
# se "SE_9040"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 32
@
パラケルスス･D. plug･バホメット
「[FFD700]サンダーマスター[-]」
「[8B0000]アサシン[-]」

# move 3401011 4 0
# mask 3401011 on
# alpha 3401011 1 0
# move 3101311 2 0
# mask 3101311 on
# fadein "white" 0.7
# se "SE_0504"
# textalign "center"
@
詳しくはお知らせをチェック！

# bgm "stop"
# se "SE_0619"
# fadeout "black" 1.5
# waitandnext 1.5
# textalign "center"
@
詳しくはお知らせをチェック！
